Our firm is based in DE & CA and has a large data base of IT candidates that we thoroughly test and screen, as our recruiters are all current /former recruitment leaders.About Even & Odd Minds -Even & Odd Minds is a talent-driven consulting firm providing individual consultants, project teams, and strategic outsourcing services to clients in a wide range of industries. We leverage our recruiting expertise to deliver high-end consulting services for engagements in select Information Technology and Engineering disciplines. Founded in 2011, Even & Odd Minds combines international reach with local depth, serving our clients all over North America.

services.title: Office Management
description: Management of a large office concerning all operation for Workers' Compensation in the State of Ohio.

bio:
Bureau of Workers' Compensation, 30 years.  Worked as:
Accountant - Accounts Payable, Office Equipment Inventory, Payroll 
Executive Assistant - Rewrote Ohio Revised Code as it pertained to Workers'    Compensation.  Manage all correspondence, travel and personnel in State Operations Manager's office.  Research and report on ways to expedite processing of claims.
Assistant Budget Director - Track all expenditures of the agency.  Find unnecessary losses and resolve the problem.  Assist in preparation of the biennial budget and present it to the Governor of Ohio and State Controlling Board for approval.
Data Base Administrator - Analyze data and design the appropriate type of database.  Train systems analysts and programmers in the use of database language.
My available hours are from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., 7 days a week.  Requested payment is commensurate with the nature of the assignment.

bio:
Administrative support professional offering versatile office management skills and proficiency in Microsoft Office programs. Strong planner and problem solver who readily adapts to change, works independently and exceeds expectations. Able to juggle multiple priorities and meet tight deadlines without compromising quality.-Office Management -Records Management- Invoices/Expense Reports/Payment Transactions--MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint· MS Outlook, MS Access, MS Publisher, Windows· Front Desk Reception & Executive Support · Event Management & Calendaring· Records Organization & Management· Journal Entries & General Ledger· Teambuilding & Staff Supervision· Spreadsheets & Accounting Reports
The devil is in the details. My strength is my ability to focus on the task at hand and deliver results with exacting details. I am a professional executive assistant with a varied background in modern office technologies.

Before project commencement, I require a clear outline of the project's final outcome, time-frames and any other relevant information. A total budget will be agreed before I start and clear indications of progress will be given back to an employer on a daily basis.Payment through Safepay Escrow (preferred) for first project. Thereafter, will invoice through Guru invoicing system. All invoices to be paid on presentation.Communications can be completed via telephone, e-mail, Skype, Yahoo Messenger, Microsoft Instant Messenger.Due to potential time differences, I will be available 24/7 for communications. Work times vary according to your business needs. Positive feedback is always appreciated and reciprocated.

abstrac: 3D Digital Sculptor, Focuses are mainly Characters,Environments, and Delivering the Dream!
bio:
When I was in the 5th grade, I saw Mortal Kombat for the first time and knew exactly what I wanted to do with my life. I had a love for computers,video games, and art and I sought a career path that allowed me to fuse them all together.

I attended Savannah College of Art and Design and studied Computer art. I worked in the video game industry for 5 years and subsequently taught 3D for almost 5 years. In that time I've refined my understanding of 3d and expanded into Digital sculpture. My life goal as an artist is to be the best version of myself that I can manifest and work on badass projects with the coolest peolpe along the way.
My hourly rate is 35 dollars an hour. I prefer to get an idea of the project so I can give you an  estimate of the price and time frame. My primary source of contact is through email.

I've been in the industry for over 15 years. Initially working for semiconductor firms (NatSemi [desinging chips] and AMD [writing tools for the performance group]). For the last 7 or so I've been in the embedded world working on agricultural guidance systems.  

My preferred coding environment is Qt (as it is a wonderful cross-platform api).  However, I've had recent experience with NodeJS.

abstrac: Professional Efficient Ethical Business and Accounting Professional, Management Consultant, Strategic Planner, Process Improver.
bio: I can make your business better in many ways, assess your financials, evaluate your sales and marketing plan, look at your upcoming projects, and help you grow.  I am an entrepreneur, have owned several successful businesses and run branch locations for large Fortune 100 corporations.  No matter the business, an independent assessment and a strategic plan CAN and WILL make you better.  If you are teachable and want an outside opinion, call me.  I offer reasonable rates and can help in any area from operations, process improvement, IT, compliance, finance, automation, and accounting.
Payment is due NET 15 days from successful completion of a project.

abstrac: You get the pro from me
bio: A John Maxwell certified coach, mentor, and public speaker who enhanced self-leadership development in business building and people building awareness.  My goal is to work with you to expand your leadership skills in becoming a person of influence in your business environment.  In addition to leadership training, I can help you with business modeling, failure and statistical analysis, program management, organizational behaviors such as SWOT, decision analysis, market analysis and direct marketing strategies.  If you are interested in improving yourself and your employees to increase your business profile, I am that person.
Hours of operations are from 9:00 am - 3:00 pm Monday - Thursday.  Means of initial communication is via emails.
